import Container from '@material-ui/core/Container' import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField' import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid'; import { relative } from 'path'; const styles = { container: { backgroundColor: "white", height: "600px", position: "fixed", top: "50%", left: "50%", transform: "translate(-50%, -50%)", borderRadius: "6px", textAlign: "center", maxWidth: "600px", minWidth: "20%", padding: "0" }, topbar: { position: "relative", backgroundColor: "#3f51b5", borderRadius: "6px", height: "60px", width: "100%" }, pastille: { color: "#a8ffa8", }, pseudo: { color: "white", position: "absolute", top: "0%", left: "0%", paddingLeft: "30px", marginTop: "15px", fontSize: "20px" }, close: { position: "absolute", top: "0%", right: "0%", height: "15px", width: "15px", paddingTop: "5px", paddingRight: "5px" }, sub_container: { position: "absolute", padding: "0" }, hr: { padding: "0", }, input_container: { position: "relative", padding: "0", backgroundColor: "red" }, input: { position: "absolute", left: "0%", width: "75%", paddingLeft: "10px", height: "80px" }, button: { position: "absolute", right: "0%", marginRight: "10px", height: "95px" }, messages: { position: "relative", overflowY: "scroll", display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", height: "400px" }, incomingMessage: { borderRadius: "8px", backgroundColor: "#1982FC", minHeight: "20px", width: "100px", textAlign: "center", padding: "20px 5px 20px 5px", }, myMessage: { borderRadius: "8px", backgroundColor: "#43CC47", minHeight: "20px", width: "100px", marginRight: "20px", textAlign: "center", padding: "20px 5px 20px 5px", overflowWrap: "break-word", }, incomingMessageList: { height: "100%", width: "50%", marginTop: "10px", marginLeft: "10px" }, myMessageList: { display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", height: "100%", width: "50%" }, pseudo_message: { marginTop: "20px", marginLeft: "5px", marginRight: "5px", color: "#a2a2a2", fontSize: "15px" }, itemIncomingMessage: { }, itemMyMessage: {}, } const Chat_component = () => { return (
